## Query.getParam() method

Retrieve the value of a given parameter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getParam(name: keyof QueryParams): unknown;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>keyof QueryParams</code> | Name of the parameter to retrieve |

<b>Returns:</b>

`unknown`

the value of the parameter, if any
